name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify Theme Detector by BSS Commerce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopify Theme Detector by BSS Commerce Extension

No technical requirements, our extension will help you quickly detect Shopify themes including those from Shopify Theme Store and custom themes. Enjoy It For Free!

I) Who Can Use Our Extension?

➜ This extension is helpful for Shopify merchants, developers, or anyone searching for Shopify themes.

II) Our Extension’s Features:

➜ Identify Shopify Themes: Instantly detect themes from Shopify Theme Store and customized themes.
➜ Non-Shopify Store Alerts: Get notified if a website does not use Shopify.
➜Easy To Use: Find the Shopify theme you need only in three steps. No technical requirements at all. 

III) How to Use:

➜ Install the Extension: Add our Shopify Theme Detector extension to your browser.
➜ Activate: Pin our extension on your browser’s toolbar.
➜ Detect: After accessing a website, click on our extension on your toolbar to see the theme information.

IV) Request for support 

If you have any questions or any issues regarding our Shopify Theme Detector extension, please don’t hesitate to contact BSS Commerce team via: support@bsscommerce.com. We are happy to help!
